column2: i3 Verticals, Inc. is a holding company, which engages in the provision of integrated payment and software solutions to small-and medium-sized businesses and organizations in strategic vertical markets. The company is headquartered in Nashville, Tennessee and currently employs 542 full-time employees. The company has built a broad suite of payment and software solutions that address the specific needs of SMBs and other organizations in its strategic vertical markets. Its primary strategic vertical markets include education, non-profit, public sector, property management and healthcare. Its integrated payment and software solutions feature payment capabilities tailored to the needs of its clients in strategic vertical markets. Its configurable payment technology solutions integrate seamlessly into clientsâ€™ third-party business management systems, provide security that complies with Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards and include reporting tools.
